channel.title: Podcast on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on PlaceOS

item.title: How to Create a Desk Booking App for Your Office Needs
item.description: Discover the steps to effectively scope a desk booking app. Optimize your office space with a tailored desk booking solution that meets your requirements.

item.title: Smart Building Data traps
item.description: Learn how to spot deceit in smart building data and understand analytics better. Protect your business from misinformation with these expert tips.

item.title: Smart Building Energy analytics
item.description: Discover how energy analytics for commercial buildings can enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Leverage data insights to optimize energy consumption today!

item.title: User input equals error: the Elon Musk approach
item.description: Tesla takes the approach, all user input equals error. Thereâ€™s a lot we can learn from that when we apply that ethos.
